pages.text: Similarly to the $(l:renewables/05_metals)other metals/$, gold is made by splashing $(item)red sand/$ with water particles.$(p)But this is only the final step in a multi-step process:$(li)Make $(item)clay blocks/$, a by-product from splashing $(item)sand/$.$(li)$(l:basics/05_fan_crafting)Blast/$ it into $(item)terracotta/$.$(li)Mill that into $(item)red sand/$.$(p)Note that $(item)clay blocks/$ also have an alternative recipe.$(br)              $(t:8x Gold Ingot)$(bold)[Requirements]/$

pages.title: Complicated Machine
pages.text: Gold can be used to make the $(item)wrench/$ and $(item)engineer's goggles/$.
